Trade/Device Name(s): Unicel DxH 800 Coulter Cellular Analysis System
Unicel DxH 800 Coulter Cellular Analysis System with Early Sepsis Indicator Application
Regulation Name(s): Device to detect and measure non-microbial analyte(s) in human clinical specimens to aid in assessment of patients with suspected sepsis
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Unicel DxH 800 Coulter Cellular Analysis System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Unicel DxH 800 Cellular Analysis System with software updates and Early Sepsis Indicator for quantitative hematology analysis and sepsis risk assessment
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative multi-parameter, automated hematology analysis of whole blood, pre-diluted whole blood, and body fluids; Early Sepsis Indicator application aids in identifying adult emergency department patients at risk of sepsis using monocyte distribution width from K2EDTA whole-blood samples, to be interpreted alongside other clinical findings.
